name: Dusk (itch) (Trident's Surge)
description: Dusk is a endless scrolling shooter casual game made for our Casual Game Production class at UCF. Dusk was created in Unity 2D with four students. Silver Raul Colon programmer, Trevor Goodwin Lead programmer, Kristal Nembhard artist, and Tiffanie Nguyen the lead artist. Dusk is designed to have a children's book art style based on Blackbird, Blackbird What Do You Do? and One Day on Our Blue Planet.
